title: Configuration for Azure interactive auth prompt

storageAccountName.description: (Required) The name of the the Azure storage account to authenticate to.

storageContainerName.description: (Required) The name of the container in the Azure storage account to authenticate to.

azureEnvironment.description: The Azure environment the storage account exists in. Defaults to AzurePublicCloud.

minimumValidityInMinutes.description: If specified and a credential exists that will be valid for at least this many minutes from the time of execution, no action will be taken.

globalCommands.description: The set of global rush commands before which this plugin should update credentials.

phasedCommands.description: The set of phased rush commands before which this plugin should update credentials.

authList.description: An array with the credential details to be retrieved from each Azure Storage location

storageAccountName.description: The name of the storage account

storageContainerName.description: The name of the container in the Azure storage account to authenticate to.

keyVaultSecretName.description: The name of the secret being fetched within Key Vault if using Key Vault Storage

keyVaultName.description: The name of the Key Vault if using Key Vault Storage

filePath.description: file path to script file that fetches credentials and returns them in type ICredentialCacheResult
